page.title: 12TOURISTS AROUND STRETTON
page.content: Many Tourists visit Church Stretton each year because it has{beautiful {scenery}and is a{peaceful}place. Ramblers and hikers with haversacks are seen on the hills. School parties come to work and {study the countryside.}Old people come in coach parties for a day out or a tour of the area. The hotels are not very posh but they are quite big. There are a few guest houses and many bed and breakfast houses. There is a caravan site by the school. You can camp there. Some farmers allow camping in their fields. Some shops like Four Seasons and the National Trust shop in Carding Mill Valley are designed to attract tourists.
